about_the_game:
Math Dash transforms learning into a thrilling adventure, challenging players to solve math problems while navigating dynamic, procedurally generated levels. As the player runs through school hallways, they must quickly answer math questions to avoid being caught by a relentless teacher. The faster and more accurate you are, the further you get, with harder problems appearing as you progress.

Key Features:

  • Procedural Generation: Each run features unique, randomly generated levels.

  • Chase Mechanic: Stay ahead of the teacher, who gets closer with every mistake.

  • Math Puzzles: Solve increasingly difficult math problems to keep your momentum.

  • Collect Coins: Gather coins for rewards and customization options.

  • Adaptive Difficulty: Problems get tougher the better you perform, keeping you on your toes.

Math Dash is designed to make learning math exciting and accessible to players of all ages, blending education with high-energy fun!

name: Math Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended for faster loading times
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700k or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: SSD for improved performance and loading times

short_description: Math Dash is a fast-paced, educational runner where you solve math problems to evade a chasing teacher. Master quick thinking, collect coins, and tackle procedurally generated levels in this colorful, fun-filled challenge.
